#summary validateOnCreate(methods)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelInitializationFunctions Model Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Register method(s) that should be called to validate new objects before they are inserted.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *methods* || string || true || - || Method name or list of method names ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- in models/User.cfc --->
<cffunction name="init">
  <cfset validateOnCreate("check")>
</cffunction>

<cffunction name="check">
</cffunction>
}}}
